pullRequest.body:
Fixes a 7-10s build delay in `RingTheory/PowerSeries/Basic`, due to `convert` idling, by changing `def` to `abbrev`. Which uncovered a diamond (unwanted `RatFunc.instCoePolynomial`).
https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/287929-mathlib4/topic/compiling.20behaviour.20within.20one.20file

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

For details on the "pull request lifecycle" in mathlib, please see:
https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/index.html

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body:
### PR summary [17bc81bfa6](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/14913/commits/17bc81bfa63692e37ab48a33b58efb1e969f976d)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

#### Declarations diff

`- PowerSeries`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>
!bench

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/aedb5498-6c6f-4f20-8386-6f04110a2697) for commit 170f508447d07b99771e2b76dc4998f69a670b20.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/ce145c44-6443-408e-9a0f-b8ce5724f554/to/aedb5498-6c6f-4f20-8386-6f04110a2697) against commit 2d49bad5f5d4f3952cfb9cd47bd77fc29db33850:
```diff
  Benchmark                               Metric         Change
  =============================================================
+ ~Mathlib.RingTheory.PowerSeries.Basic   instructions   -55.8%
```

Thanks!

bors merge
:-1: Rejected by label
Oh sorry, is this really still WIP?
One change + PR update
Ok two more
bors d+

:v: rwst can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).
bors r+
:-1: Rejected by label
@rwst Can you please take into account the last two comments? Thanks!

> @rwst Can you please take into account the last two comments? Thanks!

That was my sleepy alter ego, sorry.
bors r+

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10021356357/job/27699922501)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10021356357/job/27699922403)
Please update the PR description with details of the changes. Thanks!
Are you removing `simp` because of the linter?
Yeah, the `MvPowerSeries` versions are `simp`'d and now the discrimination tree can see them.
We can put this on the next line.
Oh, and we should leave a note about the diamond here and below.
I included something in PR preamble and the Zulip link, is this ok? What do you mean with "below"?
I *think* "below" refers to `coe_coe`, but we surely want a comment in the code explaining why we are removing the instance.
Added first comment, no idea what to write at `coe_coe`.
The same comment at `coe_coe` works fine.
Done, thanks.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore: speed up by changing `def` to `abbrev` in `RingTheory/PowerSeries/Basic`
